title: Daily reminder day 4

embed.description: FILTHY FRANK SETTLES THE WEEABOO EPIDEMIC ONCE AND FOR ALL. TWITTER: https://twitter.com/FilthyFrank FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/TheFilthyFrank SHIRTS: http://filthyfrank.spreadshirt.com/ INSTAGRAM: http://instagram.com/papafranku MUSIC: http://pinkguy.bandcamp.com/ tags: weeaboos licked my ass and i picked up a manga and now im a weeaboo

body: Daily reminder that you can be a fan of  anime and not be a weeb. This has been a daily reminder, because daily reminders aren't daily reminders if you don't do them daily.
